messages.subject: Intro from an  AlwaysUnschooled member
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I just heard that there s a great Consensual Living discussion going on here, and I d love to lurk (and participate if my sit-down time allows).  My
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, I just heard that there's a great Consensual Living discussion
going on here, and I'd love to lurk (and participate if my sit-down
time allows). My name is Angie, and we grew/transitioned quite
naturally toward whole-life unschooling from the foundations of
Attachment Parenting. My two daughters, Prairie (3.75yo) and Karina
(22mo), both nurse and co-sleep, and live and learn naturally in South
Dakota, with me as partner/playmate/facilitator/cook/bath tub
filler-upper/and not-so-successful-housekeeper. As a sidenote to "the
facts" of my intro, I am wondering if my growing "dependence" on these
great lists is heading toward "addiction" LOL! <kidding>

Thanks to Pat for the Heads-Up on AlwaysUnschooled, to all of you
dedicated unschoolers who make time to keep lists running smoothly,
and to all the newbies who bring up an enormity of great discussion
points that keep us all growing toward respectful family dynamics.

Peace,
Angie
